fileUploadDrag: Drag 'n' drop some PDF files here, or click to select files
pageSelectionError: Error loading PDF. The file may be corrupted.
extractionOptionsDescription: Edit the prompt below to guide the AI in extracting specific data. The default prompt is optimized for Nuvemshop fields.
apiKeyMissingError: API Key is not configured or invalid.
processingErrorEncountered: An error was encountered during processing:
resultsNoProducts: No products were found on the selected pages.
helpModalIntro: This application uses AI to extract structured product data from PDF catalogs. Follow the steps below for the best results.
helpModalUsageStep1: Upload one or more PDF files using the upload area.
helpModalUsageStep2: Thumbnails for each page will be displayed. Click on the pages you want to process.
helpModalUsageStep3: Optionally, customize the text prompt to guide the AI's extraction process.
helpModalUsageStep4: Click 'Extract Data' and wait for the results to appear. You can then export them as JSON or CSV.
helpModalSchemaDesc: The data is extracted into a JSON array focused on Nuvemshop structure.
helpModalFidelityNoteBody: The extraction is performed by a Generative AI model. While highly accurate, it may occasionally misinterpret data or hallucinate information. Always verify the extracted data against the source PDF.
apiKeyModalDescription: Choose how to provide the Google Gemini API key for this application.
